alert.note: Alert for Carver; Hennepin; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 12:41PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hennepin, southeastern Wright and northwestern Carver Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 1240 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Watertown, or 17 miles south of Buffalo, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Watertown and St. Bonifacius around 1245 PM CDT. Mound, Minnetrista and Delano around 100 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Orono, Maple Plain, Rockford, Medina, Independence, Maple Grove, St. Michael and Corcoran. This includes U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 133 and 140. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
